text: Jinghu North Circuit or Jinghu North Province was one of the circuits during the Song dynasty. Its administrative area corresponds to roughly the modern province of Hunan. Jinghu North Circuit and Jinghu South Circuit were split from Jinghu Circuit in 998. ==References== * * Category:Circuits of the Song dynasty Category:998 establishments Category:10th-century establishments in China
title: Jinghu North Circuit
